description: This file is a React component named 'App' which serves as the main application component for a web-based JavaScript code runner. It manages state for code input, console messages, and execution status, and includes logic for executing user code safely in a sandboxed iframe environment, handling user interactions like button clicks and keyboard shortcuts.

methods.name: appendMessage
methods.description: Helper function to append messages to the output log, adding a timestamp if not present.

methods.name: onRun
methods.description: Executes the user-provided code in a sandboxed environment, manages sandbox cleanup, updates status, and handles errors.
